name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Classic Italian pasta with meat sauce.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Brown beef with onion and garlic. Add tomato sauce and simmer. Combine and serve.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh salad with Caesar dressing and croutons.
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, top with croutons and Parmesan.

name: Tomatensuppe
instructions: Cook tomatoes with onion and garlic, blend, add broth and cream, simmer and serve.

name: Pizza Margherita
description: Classic pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Top dough with sauce, cheese, and basil. Bake at high temperature until crisp.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix ingredients, pour onto hot griddle, flip when bubbly, serve with syrup.

name: Hühnersuppe
instructions: Simmer chicken with vegetables and broth, add noodles, cook until tender.

name: Veggie Stir Fry
description: Quick and healthy vegetable stir fry.
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables in hot pan, add sauce, serve with rice.

name: Schokoladenkuchen
instructions: Mix ingredients, bake in preheated oven, let cool, optionally frost.

name: Bratkartoffeln
instructions: Boil and slice potatoes, fry with onion until crispy and golden.

name: Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs, pour into pan, add cheese, fold and serve.
